name: ac-common-module
description: Library for common functions to be used by all tools

scripts.build:htmlreport: (cd ../../report-react && npm run build && cd ../common/module && shx cp ../../report-react/build/genReport.tsx ./src//report/genReport.ts)
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run build:htmlreport && npx tsc -p tsconfig-cjs.json && sed -i'.old' 's/\/\/ const __filename/const __filename/g; s/\/\/ import { fileURLToPath }/import { fileURLToPath }/g' ./src/config/ACConfigManager.ts && npx tsc -p tsconfig-mjs.json && sed -i'.old' 's/const __filename/\/\/ const __filename/g; s/import { fileURLToPath }/\/\/ import { fileURLToPath }/g' ./src/config/ACConfigManager.ts && rm ./src/config/ACConfigManager.ts.old

author: IBM
